title: Get the transaction records of a BC or ad accounts

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: bc_id
parameters.description: Business Center ID. To obtain the list of Business Centers that you have access to, use /bc/get/ .

parameters.name: transaction_level
parameters.description: The transaction level that the transaction records will be retrieved at. Enum values: BC : The Business Center ( bc_id ). ADVERTISER : The ad accounts within the Business Center ( bc_id ). PAYMENT_PORTFOLIO : The Payment Portfolio. Default value: ADVERTISER . Note : If a Business Center has enabled Payment Portfolio, the transactions of ad accounts shared by other Business Centers won't be returned.

parameters.name: transaction_types
parameters.description: Transaction types. BILL_PAYMENT : Bill payment. ADD_BALANCE : Add balance. CANCELLATION : Cancellation. PROMOTION_ISSUED : Issued promotion, which indicates the issuance of ad credit. PROMOTION_EXPIRED : Expired promotion, which indicates the expiration of ad credit. INCREASE_BALANCE : Increase of balance. DECREASE_BALANCE : Decrease of balance. CARD_VERIFICATION : Card verification. CARD_VERIFICATION_REFUND : Card verification refund. ORDER_CREATION_PAYMENT : Order creation payment. ORDER_EDIT_PAYMENT : Order edit payment. RETURN_OF_REMAINING_BUDGET : Return of remaining budget. REFUND : Refund.

parameters.name: owner_of_account
parameters.description: Valid only when transaction_level is ADVERTISER or not passed. Owner of ad accounts. Enum values: OWNED_BY_CURRENT_BUSINESS_CENTER : Owned by the current Business Center. SHARED_BY_OTHER_BUSINESS_CENTER : Shared by another Business Center. Default value: OWNED_BY_CURRENT_BUSINESS_CENTER . If you want to obtain the transaction records of ad accounts shared by another Business Center, you need to have Admin access to these accounts. To confirm if you have Admin access to these accounts, use /bc/asset/get/ . The returned advertiser_role for the asset_id with asset_type as ADVERTISER should be ADMIN . Note : If your Business Center has more than 200 ad accounts shared by another Business Center, you cannot set this field to SHARED_BY_OTHER_BUSINESS_CENTER to filter shared ad accounts. In such cases, we recommend that you specify the account_ids filter or both account_ids and account_name filters simultaneously to narrow down the scope of your query.

parameters.name: account_ids
parameters.description: Valid only when transaction_level is ADVERTISER or not passed. A list of ad account IDs. Max size: 100.

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: Valid only when transaction_level is ADVERTISER or not passed. Ad account name. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Query start time, closed interval, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (ad account time zone or Business Center time zone). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 . The maximum query time range that you can define through start_date and end_date is 365 days. If start_time and end_time are not passed, the transaction records of the last 90 days will be returned by default.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Query end time, closed interval, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (ad account time zone or Business Center time zone). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 . The maximum query time range that you can define through start_time and end_time is 365 days. If start_time and end_time are not passed, the transaction records of the last 90 days will be returned by default.

parameters.name: billing_types
parameters.description: Billing types. Enum values: CASH : cash. CREDIT : ad credit.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1. Value range: ≥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10. Value range: 1-50.

examples.title: Get the transaction records of a BC
Get the transaction records of ad accounts
Get the transaction records of a Payment Portfolio

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: transaction_list
fields.description: The list of transaction records.

fields.name: transaction_id
fields.description: Transaction ID, the unique identifier of the translation.

fields.name: payment_portfolio_id
fields.description: The ID of the Payment Portfolio associated with the transaction. This field returns a non-null value only when transaction_level is PAYMENT_PORTFOLIO . Note : To manage the budget of a Payment Portfolio, use advertiser_budgets in /advertiser/update/ . The default budget_mode within advertiser_budgets will be CUSTOM .

fields.name: payment_portfolio_name
fields.description: The name of the Payment Portfolio associated with the transaction. This field returns a non-null value only when transaction_level is PAYMENT_PORTFOLIO .

fields.name: account_id
fields.description: The ID of the ad account associated with the transaction. When transaction_level is set to BC in the request, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: account_name
fields.description: The name of the ad account associated with the transaction. When transaction_level is set to BC in the request, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: bc_id
fields.description: Business Center ID.

fields.name: bc_name
fields.description: Business Center name.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The total amount of the transaction, which includes the subtotal and tax amount. For example, if the amount excluding tax is 50 USD and the tax is 5 USD, the total amount will be 55 USD. Example: 55.

fields.name: subtotal
fields.description: The subtotal amount (the amount excluding taxes) of the transaction. Example: 50.

fields.name: tax_amount
fields.description: The amount of tax included in the transaction. Example: 5.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency code in which the amounts ( amount , subtotal , and tax_amount ) are calculated. Example: USD .

fields.name: amount_type
fields.description: Amount type. Enum values: POSITIVE : This type represents that a positive amount is associated with the transaction, such as a balance addition. NEGATIVE : This type represents that a negative amount is associated with the transaction, such as an order creation payment. OTHER : This type represents that neither a positive amount nor a negative amount is associated with the transaction, such as a card verification refund.

fields.name: transaction_type
fields.description: Transaction type. BILL_PAYMENT : Bill payment. ADD_BALANCE : Add balance. CANCELLATION : Cancellation. PROMOTION_ISSUED : Issued promotion, which indicates the issuance of ad credit. PROMOTION_EXPIRED : Expired promotion, which indicates the expiration of ad credit. INCREASE_BALANCE : Increase of balance. DECREASE_BALANCE : Decrease of balance. CARD_VERIFICATION : Card verification. CARD_VERIFICATION_REFUND : Card verification refund. ORDER_CREATION_PAYMENT : Order creation payment. ORDER_EDIT_PAYMENT : Order edit payment. RETURN_OF_REMAINING_BUDGET : Return of remaining budget. REFUND : Refund.

fields.name: billing_type
fields.description: Billing type. Enum values: CASH : cash. CREDIT : ad credit.

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: The time zone where the transaction occurred, in the format of UTC±HH:MM . Example: "UTC+07:00" .

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the transaction record was generated, in the format of "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" . Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:01

fields.name: invoice_id
fields.description: Invoice ID. To download the invoice synchronously, pass the invoice ID to /bc/invoice/download/ . To download the invoice asynchronously, pass the invoice ID to /bc/invoice/task/create/ .

fields.name: serial_number
fields.description: Invoice serial number.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "transaction_list": [
            {
                "transaction_id": "{{transaction_id}}",
                "subtotal": 280000,
                "amount_type": "NEGATIVE",
                "billing_type": "CASH",
                "serial_number": "",
                "bc_name": "{{bc_name}}",
                "tax_amount": 0,
                "amount": 280000,
                "transaction_type": "DECREASE_BALANCE",
                "invoice_id": "",
                "create_time": "{{create_time}}",
                "account_name": null,
                "bc_id": "{{bc_id}}",
                "timezone": "UTC+07:00",
                "currency": "VND",
                "account_id": null
            },
            {
                "transaction_id": "{{transaction_id}}",
                "subtotal": 280000,
                "amount_type": "POSITIVE",
                "billing_type": "CASH",
                "serial_number": "{{serial_number}}",
                "bc_name": "Phụ kiện oto VIP",
                "tax_amount": 30249,
                "amount": 310249,
                "transaction_type": "ADD_BALANCE",
                "invoice_id": "{{invoice_id}}",
                "create_time": "{{create_time}}",
                "account_name": null,
                "bc_id": "{{bc_id}}",
                "timezone": "UTC+07:00",
                "currency": "VND",
                "account_id": null
            }
        ],
        "page_info": {
            "total_number": 2,
            "total_page": 1,
            "page_size": 50,
            "page": 1
        }
    }
}
